name: Eau de Parfum Discovery Sampler Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description: Experience the curated collection of six of our fine fragrances; each has a unique, sophisticated, and genderless scent profile: Char, Flora Carnivora, Jake's House, Queens & Monsters, Torn, Windows Down. New to Henry Rose or looking to expand your fragrance portfolio, our discovery set will help you find your perfect signature scent...About the Bottle: We craft our products to be modern and minimal, with the clear glass vial highlighting our dedication to 100% ingredient transparency and ethical sourcing. We are the first and only fine fragrance brand that is both EWG Verified and Cradle to Cradle Certified; these remarkable credentials ensure that every fragrance is made without controversial ingredients and meets the highest standards for human and environmental health...About the Fragrance: Henry Rose founder Michelle Pfeiffer couldn't find a fragrance brand that provided 100 percent ingredient transparency, so she created one. Through years of questioning, testing, and persistence, we designed a line of fine fragrances that meets the strictest standards of safety known today, using a short list of safe, intoxicating scent notes. Then, we created a collection of sophisticated and unique fragrances using just those...This Set Contains:- 6 x 0.05 oz/ 1.5 mL Fragrances in Char, Flora Carnivora, Jake's House, Queens & Monsters, Torn, Windows Down..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly none of the scents smell that different from one another and none are that great. I've purchased other samplers from different brands and they have distinct smells however this does not. All a variation from a faint smell that smells more like alcohol in the initial spritz than perfume.
I bought it today. Nope. There's no way in the worldu2026.It doesn't smell good at all. Thankfully I just the sample to try before. NO
I don't know what it is with this brand, but it just doesn't work well with my body chemistry and they are all very strong scents.  ufffc These are definitely genderless in my opinion. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really disappointed in this discovery set considering the hype. These are all my first impressions of the scents:  Queens and Monsters: Powdery, zesty and sour. Citrusy and has notes of fresh grass. Too astringent for me. 4/10  Windows down: First spray is a burst of lemons. Dry down is more white floral but something about it reminds me of my doctor's office. 3/10.  Torn: This one was one of the more tolerable for me. It's very sweet and woody. After a while though the sweetness becomes overbearing and headache inducing. 6/10.  Char: Woody and vanilla notes... that's it. Very mild and lacks depth. 7/10.  Flora Carnivora: You like white florals? Well this is white florals on steroids. Simultaneously smells like laundry detergent and the dollar store. I didn't enjoy this one at all. 1/10.  Jake's House: Initial spray kind of smells like grass. It's a classic aquatic scent with powdery notes. There's also white floral notes in there which blend nicely. However there is an undertone of mustiness on the dry down that I don't love. 6/10.   This is a PSA to try samples of fragrances before you commit to a whole bottle! The hype isn't always real.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: lovely way to sample different scents.  I will buy the full size of my favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Agree that there was a lot of hype for this collection, and perhaps it's because it was among the most splashy clean perfume launches that's celebrity backed. 4 stars for the fact that the scents are extremely potent, but not 5 because the collection is not for me. They feature scent profiles that are clean versions of really well-established scent profiles (like givenchy floral, tom ford gourmand and aquatic etc.), which is not what I was hoping for. I wanted something more unique. For unique, go for the clean brands that fly under the radar a bit more.

reviews.review_title: Love the Sampler Set to Discover HR is Overhyped
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Char: predicted to be the worst; couldn't smell a thing Flora Carnivora: predicted to be good/bad; too faint to detect a single note Jake's House: predicted to be just okay; moreso vomit-inducing Torn: predicted to be the best spicy that I own; if you're into spicy playdough Queens & Monsters: predicted to be unamusing; yup, very lackluster Windows Down: predicted to be a meh good scent; another faint fail from Henry Rose  Going into this set, I was most looking forward to Flora Carnivora, Jake's House, and Torn. And ironically, they were the ones that disappointed me the most. I am not a huge fan of clean anything, but I thought Henry Rose could prove me wrong since this brand is usually raved about. Nope, not even close! And as for the staying power, it's okay for about an hour at most for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overhyped. Scents too strong, last about 2 hours. Niche but okay to try. Happy I didn't get a full size. Sprays are really nice and like a mist!

reviews.review_title: Clean and Elegant way to your perfect scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a perfect sampler to try these gorgeous, elegant and clean fragrances. I loved being able to wear each scent and see how they wear over time, from the initial note down to what they leave on skin. I found my perfect scent and fell in love with Queens &Monsters, a sensual and creamy amber gourmand. And I get to travel with these cute sprays too and continue enjoy all possible combinations!  A must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose has changed the fragrance game entirely.  I am enjoying the fact that I get to choose a fine fragrance that proves one doesn't have to sacrifice quality for safety. The 'discovery set' is self-explanatory and a joy to discover each day. Layering is a whole new world.

Queens and Monsters smell a little like play dough to me at first. This might sound weird but I mainly use these and the Replica sampler as my foot perfume. I really like that I know the ingredients!

So I bought this trying to look for a new perfume. I've been using a musky but fresh fragrance for about six years now and wanted to change it up.. I was very disappointed. Only TWO of these were wearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice set of perfumes. Unusual scents. I like it.

reviews.review_title: Uhm...YEAH I'll take 5!!! & THEY DO LAST LONG!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. I'm glad I didn't listen to the reviews. First of all, I sprayed all six in different areas of my arms and scrubbing my body with a scented soap still didn't remove the scents so each and every one of them DO last long. Jakes house was a immediate favorite, even with my fiance and normally no fragrances stand out to him on me. Queens and Monsters was another favorite. I love how delicate the dry down was on Queens and Torn. Torn gives me Rose Prick or Burnt Cherry vibes? and Char gives me Milk by Commodity vibe for sure. Jakes House and Queens and Monsters are my all time new FAVS! Flora is another strong favorite. So in love with Henry Rose!

reviews.review_title: Great variety & intro to the brand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my honest & authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  WHAT I LIKE: * Variety - an excellent way to try different fragrances  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * Would be great to list the key notes for each scent on the box * Include a voucher for the price of the set to be applied towards full size purchase  FYI: * Packaging, with its minimalist aesthetic, is beautiful  BUY or BYE?: * BUY  * CHAR - Opens with a soft burning embers scent, not too strong, very nice before transforming into an airier & lighter, slightly gourmand scnet - softly sweet, with the faintest hint of vanilla. A very mild mix of leather & amber comes through at the end.  * FLORA CARNIVORA - The neroli & tuberose stand out at the beginning, which I really enjoy. There's a familiar, clean scent to it that, while not offensive, isn't something I cared for, a cross between soap & fabric softener, that fortunately dissipates. Dry down is a very light (too light) white floral scent.  * JAKE'S HOUSE - Clean, aquatic opening, with a pretty neroli scent coming forward, before turning into a mildly cloying, sterile, almost chemical smell that I did not find pleasant.  * QUEENS & MONSTERS - The green, powdery violet notes on the first spritz quickly transformed into a creamy woodsy floral blend that I found to be pretty & pleasant. The caramel notes at the dry down add a warm, richness to the scent. A lovely date night scent.  * TORN - The initial grassy, musky, & earthy notes were not pleasing to my nose but I'm glad I stuck with it a little while longer for the light, creamy vanilla & amber in the middle - those were lovely & my favorite part of this fragrance. It sadly didn't last very long before the dry down - an earthy, herbal patchouli or vetiver scent - kicked in.  * WINDOWS DOWN - The opening calls to mind citrus fruits & earl grey tea, with a light floral in the beginning & middle. I pick up spice & musk at the end.The fragrance isn't bad, it's just not my cup of tea.

Felt good about wearing Henry Rose perfumes during pregnancy. This is one of the best clean fragrance brans out there! This sample set has something for everyone whether - fresh? Jake's House. floral? Flora Carnivora. vanilla? Torn

reviews.review_text: I've had these little perfume samples for 2 weeks now and I think I can safely say I hate them all. Every single one smells cheap and inexpensive... they don't last on the skin (for me that was a good thing) and they reek of old 70s airport perfume.... pass on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the perfume it smells amazing! I just wish it would last longer. I would say maybe an hour then gone completely. This perfume would be great for someone that doesn't like heavy perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'd had my eye on this brand for awhile so, when it came to Sephora, I took it as a sign to try them out finally. I went with the discovery set first to sample a few of them, and I was not disappointed. I will definitely be ordering the full size in Windows Down- that was by far my favorite, though I will be using them all from this set. I know Jake's House is up there in popularity, but that wasn't my favorite- simply because after reading the notes, they're not ones I'm typically drawn to, which explained it. They're absolutely unisex scents, though depending on your tastes, some may be more than others. Would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand! The best clean products and most gorgeous scents! I am obsessed with Windows Down. Long lasting & clean perfume. It doesn't get better than this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Ok, but not quite what I like...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked Windows Down, then maybe Jake's House and Char the most. But they did take at least a week to get used to/appreciate and aren't quite what I like. At first they can smell dated, but once they warm up to the skin they smell better. Will I repurchase? I'm still uncertain. I'll know better once I'm done with the samples. One thing I find they do is fade out a little faster than most other fragrances I use, which is one of the reasons I hesitate. But again, the initial spritz isn't always as pleasant as I like (except for Windows Down, which I seem to like from first spritz to set down). Queens & Monsters reminds me a little too much of Burberry Her, which I really dislike. I much prefer complex scents especially when musk is included. These were gifted by HenryRose for me to test and leave my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

This set was really good and had nice assortment from Henry Rose. The perfumes all smell decadent. My favorite so far is Windows Down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I really like the discovery set and samplers in general because then you get to really decide which one will be your signature scent out of the bunch. If  had to pick a favorite of the bunch it would be queens & monsters for me, it dried down really nice and lasted some time. These were gifted to me by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose there Eau De Parfum and I love all the scents!! My favorite is Torn which has notes of vanilla, musk,  sandalwood,  and vetiver and is the perfect combination of sweet and sultry! My other favorites are Windows Down and Flora Carnivora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

It comes with 6 samples, I have tried everyone of them. Really surprised me for this one, long lasting smell. I will consider purchasing a full size in the future.

The Henry Rose discovery set is a nice set that can be used by anyone. The array of scents makes it a perfect starter kit. The clean ingredients makes it perfect for me and my family who has sensitive skin and this allows me to enjoy the fragrance without worrying about affecting my family's well-being. Torn is a classic scent in my household and is the most preferred. Gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this Henry Rose discovery set.  I was unfamiliar with the brand so this was a perfect way to sample out some of their scents.  I do like that the vials were pretty full, not like others, where they are only half filled.  This set includes six vials of genderless fine fragrances.  You get a good variation of scents.  Four of the scents just weren't for me.  I liked Queens and Monsters and loved Flora Carnivora out of all the scents.  I do wish the scents were longer lasting, for me they faded much too fast.  I love sets like this and I was able to discover one that I love!  Gifted by Henry Rose for my own thoughts and opinions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore Henry Rose perfumes. They have a sexy yet fresh alluring scent across the board and each fragrance smells divine. As someone who usually gravitates more floral scents, I really loved the scent windows. It smells so luxurious and expensive and now I have to get the full size after smelling this.  They each have a beautiful scent and it's great to be able to sample each of these before purchasing the full sized bottles. I love keeping them in my purse to refresh my scent since it fits perfectly in all of my bags and I'll be running to the store to pick up a full size bottle! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume set is amazing. Each scent is so unique, long lasting and beautiful. In love the different variety you get. Char has a very refreshing scent with a touch of orange blossom. Flora Carnivora is Allure Best of Beauty Winner from 2022, its one of my favorites with key notes of jasmine, Orange Blossom, Floral, and musk. I also really liked Jake's House with key notes of citrus and musk. Queens & Monsters is also an Allure Best of Beauty Winner of 2020 with key notes of neroli, freesia, and sandalwood. Torn is another favorite of mine with key notes of vanilla, musk, sandalwood, and vetiver. Windows Down is another Allure Best of Beauty Winner of 2021 and has key notes of grapefruit, jasmine, and musk. All these fragrances are EWG Verified, Cradle to Cradle Certified, and Cruelty-Free.

# Gifted by Henry Rose. I'm in love with the way it packaged. The great part about this Parfum are ingredients. Love how it smells, some of fragrant more some less, but still super nice. Last for the long time. Great way to choose your own.

My favorites are Char, Torn, Jakes House + Windows Down. Some of these do have a floral note but the majority of the notes are not floral! The longevity is pretty moderate on me, it performs longer than some of my other favorite and more expensive fragrances. I'm impressed with the quality especially since these fragrances are labeled u201cclean at sephorau201d and cruelty free. They don't smell weak or watered down. reviews.review_title: A Must Have In Your Daily Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose for my honest review. Let me just say, I LOVE these perfumes!!! Each and every scent is so distinct and different. 1 spray goes a LONG way. They're so strong, but not in an obnoxious and choking your senses kind of way. This is the first time in a long time that I've come across perfumes I like. Perfumes that I don't have to spray multiple times on myself just so I can smell it a little. You know how when we go to apply our perfume, you have to spray like 2 or 3 times just to get a good whiff? Not with these. 1 spray on my wrist and those beautiful scents are filling my room & I imagine myself in a field of flowers. It's hard to choose just ONE scent because they all smell so amazing, but if I had to choose, it would be Char. Char is just so soft, so floral, so feminine to me & makes me feel sexy when I wear it. I'm stocking up on Char & Flora though because Flora to me reminds me of fabric softener & idk, it's just beautiful. Hurry up and buy these today. Thank you Henry Rose for this set. I'll be so sad when I finish them up.

reviews.review_text: This perfume set is gifted by Henry Rose. Henry Rose is a fragrance brand founded in 2018. The brand is known for creating high-quality, sustainable, and hypoallergenic fragrances. Henry Rose uses a proprietary system called Clean at Sephora to ensure that all of its fragrances are free from harmful ingredients, such as parabens, phthalates, and formaldehyde. The fragrances are also vegan and cruelty-free. I tried all the scent, and I liked the u201cflorau201d, u201ccharu201d and u201ctornu201d the most. These three smells sweet and relaxing, which is good for working and/or dating. The u201cqueensu201d has strong green or herb scent, which I don't like that much. u201cJake'su201d and u201cwindowsu201d are clean and fresh, which I think men can wear it too.

Value wise, this isn't it. Scent wise- this brand is great! I did discover scents I would definitely wear- char, torn and windows down are all warm, bright and earthy florals that feel elegant but not too heavy or pretentious. I thought Jake's house stood out as a far more woodsy scent, and it was more masculine- it made sense to me for my husband to wear. Overall, the scents are excellent, but you might want to just stop in the store and check them out- at best you'd get a few uses from each bottle before you need to decide if you want to commit to a scent or not.

I would wear this in the spring and summer because it's very light and airy. Flora Carnavora and Queens and Monsters were also good. They start off very floral. Then, they turn into a bit of a muskier scent as it dries down after maybe an hour. They're heavier scents and they project well. However, I didn't like Char, Jakes House, or Torn. They all felt too masculine to me. They are very heavy on the musk and woody notes.

reviews.review_title: I enjoyed every one of these
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Henry Rose in exchange for my honest review. The Discovery Set includes 6 wonderful Perfumes. Windows is a citrusy scent with Neroli, Grapefruit, Bergamot and Earl Grey Tea as top notes. Middle notes are Orange Flower and Jasmine. Bottom notes are Moss, Guaiacwood and Musk. It's a breathtakingly beautiful scent. Torn is a spicy and earthy floral scent. Top notes are Freesia and Muguet. Middle notes are Rose, Violet and Jasmine. Bottom notes are Sandalwood, Musk, Patchouli, Vanilla Bean and Praline. I love this one and it's a fun scent. Queens and Monsters is a rich unique scent. Top notes are Violet Leaf, Neroli and Petitgrain. Middle notes are Freesia and Jasmine. Bottom notes are Vanilla, Coco Musk and Sandalwood. It's a long lasting scent that is my favorite out of the 6. Jake's House is a clean scent. Top note is Fresh Marine. Middle notes are Neroli, Peony and Jasmine. Bottom notes are Ambroxan and Musk. This one puts me to mind of summers at the beach and I do enjoy this one. Flora Carnivora is a floral scent. Top notes are Orangeflower Water Absolute Tunisia and Neroli Blanc. Middle notes are Jasmine Absolute Sambac and Tuberose Accord. Bottom notes are Cedarwood Texas, Vetiver Oil Haiti, Opulent Musk's and Amber. This is a beautiful floral scent that I always get compliments on. Char is an Amber Woody scent. With top notes of South American Tonka Bean, Ivory Coast Ginger and Labdanum Resinoid. Middle notes are Indonesian Patchouli, Moroccan Orange Flower. Bottom notes are Haitian Vetiver. This reminds me of a night out by the campfire.  I enjoy having choices and with this Discovery Set, I have easily found my favorite. They are all beautiful scents and I enjoy them all.

I also really enjoy the fresh and floral scent of Jake's House, which includes notes of jasmine and honeysuckle.  Overall, the Henry Rose discovery set is a great value for the price and allows you to try out a variety of different fragrances to find your perfect match. The packaging is also sleek and modern, making it a great gift option for any fragrance lover.

reviews.review_text: I love trying new perfumes but don't always have time to go to a store in person to try things out.  I also think that to really gauge if you like a fragrance you need to wear it a few times in order to see how it wears and reacts on your skin.  That is why this Discovery Set, gifted by Henry Rose is a great option.  So far I have liked u201cWindows Downu201d best but have found that it has a short wear time for me.  I would say each vial has about 2-3 applications in it.  So not a generous amount but enough to decide if you want a larger bottle.  I will say that the only reason this set is worth $28 is if you can't or don't want to go to a store in person to try the fragrances or can't find a store that carries them locally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey Beauties!   #HenryRoseGiftedMe their Discovery Set!   Char~ Amber Woody (Fresh & Warm) Tonka Bean Absolute and Ivory Coast Ginger blend with a hint of Moroccan Orange Flower to create a smoky, enticing cocktail of a fragrance   Flora Carnivora~ Floral (Warm) Their first true floral scent. Earthy vetiver meets soft jasmine, tuberose, and bright orange flower   Windows Down~ Citrusy (Warm) Bright grapefruit and bergamot encounter honeyed neroli and soft earl grey tea for a light and floral finish.   Jake's House~ Clean (Fresh) Watery clean freshness encounters honeyed neroli for a light and clean musky finish.   Queens & Monsters~ Rich (Warm) The freshness and zest of petitgrain balance the fluid sensuality of sandalwood to create a woody aroma.   Torn~ Spicy (Warm) The richness of vanilla bean blends with the earthiness of vetiver roots to create an aroma that's both spicy and floral.   First and foremost, I love that they combined some both of their Discovery Sets (Fresh & Warm) into this set!  As I've previously noted in other posts, I'm usually not a fan of warm scents, but I've noticed that has changed since I've delved into more and more of the fragrance realm. Each scent is distinctly unique and has their own notes that just entice my different moods. Although, Char has been my go-to, which is a combination of fresh and warm category and the other being Jake's Room fresh scent category. These two scents, while being completely different, are both fighting for my heart, and then again, they all are. I'm so excited to decide which one of these will be my first full-size purchase. I love the fact that these are genderless fine fragrances, but most of all, the transparency of this amazing brand.   The first EWG verified and CRADLE TO CRADLE Certified Collection of Fine Fragrances. And yes, they're hypoallergenic and Cruelty-Free, too!   @HenyRose~ Discovery Set

I am a fresh and fruity perfume person, so Jake's house, Flora Carnivora, and Window's down are my favorite! Window's down is that perfect flirty fruity fresh for the summer. I thought I wouldn't like Char, but it was what I wanted By The Fireplace to be. I own a lot of perfumes, and I have to say, all of these are mature, well thought out and unique. Overall I am very impressed! I was gifted by Henry Rose, but all my reviews are honest.
